info.error-loading-form: An error occurred while loading the page. You can try again by clicking on the button.
info.error-sending-form: We're sorry. Something went wrong while sending the form. Please try again or send an email to support@injixo.com. We thank you for your understanding.

placeholder.description: In order to be able to process your ticket more efficiently, we ask that you only record one problem per ticket.
placeholder.phone: Phone number must contain only numbers, + ( ) - . and x

guide.create-ticket: Create a ticket to ask for expert support from injixo.
guide.provide-information: Just provide information about what you want to do and what is happening instead.

whats-next.pre: After sending your request, you will receive a confirmation email including a Ticket ID for your reference. The team will answer your request as quickly as possible via email. It would be helpful to provide a phone number so we can contact you in urgent cases.

gdpr.pre: InVision needs the contact information you provide to us to contact you about your issue. For information about our privacy practices and commitment to protecting your privacy, please review our

docs.post: where you can find documentation about how to use injixo.
docs.pre: You can also check our knowledge base
